amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Fund Program Account of the Community Development Financial Institutions by $500,000 and reduces funding for taxpayer services at IRS by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Fund Program Account of the Community Development Financial Institutions by $500,000 and to reduce funding for taxpayer services at IRS by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
